# verify redirect block is generated when template calls Redirect

muxt generate
cat template_template_routes_gen.go
grep 'redirectURL != ""' template_template_routes_gen.go

-- in.go --
package main

func main() {}
-- template.go --
package main

import (
	"embed"
	"html/template"
)

//go:embed template.gohtml
var templatesDir embed.FS

var templates = template.Must(template.ParseFS(templatesDir, "template.gohtml"))
-- go.mod --
module example.com

go 1.25
-- template.gohtml --
{{define "GET / 200"}}{{(.Redirect "/login" 302).Header "X-Peach" "peach"}}{{end}}
